title: Supabase Edge Function Deployment for Web Projects
description: Discovered that Edge Functions can be deployed to web Supabase projects using the --use-api flag, bypassing the Docker requirement

key_learning.use_case: Deploying Edge Functions to web Supabase projects without local Docker
key_learning.benefit: Enables direct deployment from development environment to web project
key_learning.constraint_resolution: Resolves the Docker requirement for web-only development workflows

successful_deployment.deployment_confirmation: Deployed Functions on project iqivodptfhiatllakuap: generate-embeddings

discovery_context: Phase 2 implementation - deploying vector embedding generation capability
